title: Need font similar to Elderkin bold
content:
Help all,

I am working on a logo and I am looking to a font similar to elderkin bold.  
Elderkin has been discontinued. It looks like Helvetica Bold Condensed but it has slightly rounded corners.  
This gives it a punched leather/ woodcut feel.

It was used on the cover of the Annual of Type Directors Club 26.

Any fonts that are similar would be great. I have a tight deadline and would prefer to not have to recreate something.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tdc26annual.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/typophile.com/files/tdc26annual_0.jpg) | 39.66 KB |
author: cj1100

comments.content:
Hi Chris,

have a look at

- [Brauer Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Brauer+Neue/Black/)
- [FF Hydra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=hydra)
- [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic)
- [Gravur Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Gravur+Condensed/Black/)
- [Ketchupa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fountain/ketchupa/)
- [Ultramagnetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174303/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0020)

F

Thanks, those are a good start.

c jONEs DESIGN
